feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Celebratory first post (+ an ice cream store thought)

link.title: Celebratory first post (+ an ice cream store thought)

entry.content:
Welcome to the first post of my website!

On a sidenote, I was at an ice cream store thinking of how most shops in the UK now only accept card. Growing up, my parents would often give me a few spare coins to get ice cream with friends, but nowadays this wouldnâ€™t be possible. Would you trust your child with your credit/debit card, or would young kids (~6/7 year olds) have their own in a cashless society?
